abstract: DealBook Online; New York State Financial Services Dept acting superintendent Anthony J Albanese sends letter to Symphony Communications asking if its new messaging platform could enable traders to collude on manipulating prices.
lead_paragraph: The state’s top financial regulator is asking whether the platform developed by Symphony Communications could facilitate collusion among traders.

headline.main: New York Seeks Information on Wall Street Messaging Platform

snippet: The state’s top financial regulator is asking whether the platform developed by Symphony Communications could facilitate collusion among traders.
